title: Michael Zezas: Unpacking the Politics of Deficits
description: Policymakers and voters may care about deficits, but reducing current spending may not be a priority over other issues—and right now that may be a plus for the economy.
itunes:title: Michael Zezas: Unpacking the Politics of Deficits
itunes:summary: Policymakers and voters may care about deficits, but reducing current spending may not be a priority over other issues—and right now that may be a plus for the economy.
